thread.title: Sanders\Wingo Chairman Appointed to Ad Council Board of Dir
thread.title_full: Sanders\Wingo Chairman Appointed to Ad Council Board of Dir

author: Sanders\Wingo
title: Sanders\Wingo Chairman Appointed to Ad Council Board of Dir
text:
AUSTIN, Texas , Oct. 8,   Sanders\Wingo chairman, Robert V. Wingo , has been elected to the Ad Council Board of Directors, led by David Christopher , CMO of AT&T Mobility. The Ad Council is a nonprofit organization and the largest U.S. producer of national public service campaigns. All creative, media and strategy is donated by agencies, while board members provide financial support and insights to create highly influential campaigns. 
"I'm honored to serve with the top marketing and media leaders in our nation today," said Bob Wingo . "2016 will be a dynamic and productive year for the Ad Council, and I'm looking forward to being part of it."
Bob is a passionate community leader, serving on several boards, including HCA/Las Palmas Del Sol Medical Center, The Holocaust Museum of El Paso and the Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial in Washington, D.C. In 2009, "Black Enterprise" magazine named Sanders\Wingo Agency of the Year.
"For over 70 years, the Ad Council has been a dominant voice at the forefront of social change," said S\W president and CEO, Leslie Wingo . "Bob's role on the board will allow all of us at Sanders\Wingo to help the Ad Council make history."
About Sanders\Wingo
Sanders\Wingo's work includes strategy, media and creative development for AT&T, KFC, Ocean Alexander, GECU, CINTRA US , Destination El Paso and other major brands. The agency is home to more than 90 creative entrepreneurs and independent thinkers in Austin and El Paso, Texas , as well as satellite offices in New York and Atlanta . Learn more at sanderswingo.com .
